1: Gavyn needs to exit the graveyard.
Interact with items to exit graveyard and make your way to the market.
2: There seem to be some wanted posters with familiar faces lying around here. See how many you can find.
3: Gavyn must obtain the letter that needs to be delivered to Independence Hall.
Search the Market for your contact.
4: Bring your contact's letter to Indepenence Hall.
It'd be best if you don't get caught with this letter.
